description:
This lightning talks session gives members of our group the chance to spend up to 10 minutes sharing their agile ideas & experiences with a friendly and supportive audience.

This is a great way to get to hear talks about a variety of agile-related topics, and an even better opportunity to share your experience with the community by presenting a short talk.

Our talks for the evening are as follows:-

• Scott Fulton - "Developers aren't machines"

• Dan Laasna Reuter - "My experience of Agile" 

• Gary Shepherd - "Testing Communities of Practice - in practice"

• Craig Livings - "How to help anybody do anything"

• Alan Furlong - “Beating Burnout – How to Recognise The 17 Symptoms of Burnout.” 

• Darwin Peltan - "Why Google Design Sprints Rock"

Our hosts for the evening, Amdocs, have plenty of parking on site and will be providing refreshments and nibbles.
title: Lightning Talks
